DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Acupuncture obtain abide effect migraine prophylaxis Design : A open-label randomized control trial . 249 participant include . Three arm : acupuncture acupoint-meridian， non-acupoint-meridian group , wait list .
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : attest abide efficacy safety acupuncture migraine prophylaxis Design : A open-label randomized control trial performed Chengdu , Hunan Chongqing province . Two hundred forty-three participant randomly assign acupoint-meridian group , non-acupoint-meridian group , wait-and-see group . Each participant receive 20 session acupuncture 4 week , duration 30 minute session . After treatment accomplish , 5 time follow-ups impending every 4 week . The primary outcome frequency migraine attack 16 week inclusion . Secondary outcome include frequency migraine attack 4th 24th week , headache severity , MSQ ( Migraine Specific Quality Life Questionnaire MSQ Version2.1 ) , etc .
DOC.criteria: Age subject 18 65 year old ( initially occur beneath age 50 ) , male female ; accordance diagnosis migraine without aura International Classification Headache Disorders , ICHD2 , IHS ; 2 8 time attack per month recent 3 month , period beyond 15 day ; migraine history 1 year ; able willing finish headache diary baseline ; inform consent form must sign patient lineal relative ; Exclusion Criteria： Patients unconscious , psychotic . Patients aggravate tumor serious consumptive disease , subject infection bleeding . With serious primary illness disease cardiovascular , liver , renal , gastrointestinal , hematological system . Pregnant woman woman lactation .
